alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 22 at 2:40AM MDT until April 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 12 AM TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Arlington and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...From 12 AM to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow could reduce visibility at times Saturday morning. A Winter Weather Advisory is also in effect during this period.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
